forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 16C. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 18C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 66F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers late at night. Low 12C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
